text: Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport () or Belgrade Airport () is an airport in Belgrade, Serbia. It is run by the French company Vinci Airports. The Serbian national plane company uses Belgrade Nikola Tesla as their hub. It was founded on 13 March 1992; 28 years ago. In 2019 it had seen 6,159,000 passengers and 20,064 tons of cargo pass through it. ==References== Category:20th-century establishments in Serbia Category:1992 establishments in Europe Category:Airports in Europe Category:Buildings and structures in Belgrade
title: Belgrade Nikola Tesla Airport
